11#include "video/adaptation/bitrate_constraint.h"
12
13#include <utility>
14#include <vector>
15
16#include "api/sequence_checker.h"
17#include "call/adaptation/video_stream_adapter.h"
18#include "video/adaptation/video_stream_encoder_resource_manager.h"
19
20namespace webrtc {
21
22BitrateConstraint::BitrateConstraint()
23 : encoder_settings_(absl::nullopt),
24 encoder_target_bitrate_bps_(absl::nullopt) {
25 sequence_checker_.Detach();
26}
27
28void BitrateConstraint::OnEncoderSettingsUpdated(
29 absl::optional<EncoderSettings> encoder_settings) {
30 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
31 encoder_settings_ = std::move(encoder_settings);
32}
33
34void BitrateConstraint::OnEncoderTargetBitrateUpdated(
35 absl::optional<uint32_t> encoder_target_bitrate_bps) {
36 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
37 encoder_target_bitrate_bps_ = std::move(encoder_target_bitrate_bps);
38}
39
40bool BitrateConstraint::IsAdaptationUpAllowed(
41 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
42 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions_before,
43 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions_after) const {
44 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
45 // Make sure bitrate limits are not violated.
46 if (DidIncreaseResolution(restrictions_before, restrictions_after)) {
47 if (!encoder_settings_.has_value()) {
48 return true;
49 }
50
51 uint32_t bitrate_bps = encoder_target_bitrate_bps_.value_or(0);
52 if (bitrate_bps == 0) {
53 return true;
54 }
55
56 if (VideoStreamEncoderResourceManager::IsSimulcast(
57 encoder_settings_->encoder_config())) {
58 // Resolution bitrate limits usage is restricted to singlecast.
59 return true;
60 }
61
62 absl::optional<int> current_frame_size_px =
63 input_state.single_active_stream_pixels();
64 if (!current_frame_size_px.has_value()) {
65 return true;
66 }
67
68 absl::optional<VideoEncoder::ResolutionBitrateLimits> bitrate_limits =
69 encoder_settings_->encoder_info().GetEncoderBitrateLimitsForResolution(
70 // Need some sort of expected resulting pixels to be used
71 // instead of unrestricted.
72 GetHigherResolutionThan(*current_frame_size_px));
73
74 if (bitrate_limits.has_value()) {
75 RTC_DCHECK_GE(bitrate_limits->frame_size_pixels, *current_frame_size_px);
76 return bitrate_bps >=
77 static_cast<uint32_t>(bitrate_limits->min_start_bitrate_bps);
78 }
79 }
80 return true;
81}
82
83} // namespace webrtc
84
